summary: This document outlines the terms of the Butterfly Trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein, naming Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn as trustees. It details the powers of the trustees, the management of trust assets, and the conditions under which beneficiaries may be added or removed.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, establishing its terms and conditions.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the trustees of the Butterfly Trust, responsible for managing the trust according to its terms.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn serves as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust alongside Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Ghislaine N. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the Butterfly Trust, with the trustees having the discretion to distribute trust assets to her.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Harry I. Beller is the notary public who witnessed the signing of the trust agreement and the addition of beneficiaries.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, and Darren K. Indyke is one of the trustees managing the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the Butterfly Trust, and Richard Kahn is one of the trustees managing the trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn serve as co-trustees of the Butterfly Trust, working together to manage its assets.
Darren K. Indyke, as a trustee, has the authority to distribute assets to Ghislaine N. Maxwell as a beneficiary of the trust.
Richard Kahn, as a trustee, has the authority to distribute assets to Ghislaine N. Maxwell as a beneficiary of the trust.

events.title: Establishment of Butterfly Trust
events.description: The Butterfly Trust was established by Jeffrey E. Epstein, with Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn appointed as trustees.

events.title: Addition of Beneficiaries
events.description: Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn, as trustees, added beneficiaries to the Butterfly Trust.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust was established on December 21, 2006, by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are named as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the trust.
The trust agreement is irrevocable and governed by the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The document includes provisions for the addition of beneficiaries by the trustees during the lifetime of the Grantor.
